record.dc:title: 128BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Showing burial 16BY42, a juvenile which lay directly under 16BY37, 38, and 39. Square 1R5. Direction South.
record.wpa:narrative: Indeterminate juvenile in good condition, extended on back with head to WNW. Pit showed below 16BY37--filled with dark humus, very soft. Pit extends beyond end of 16BY37 pit. Bones resting on subsoil. Skull on base facing somewhat to right. Feet together, somewhat higher than pelvis, toes up. This burial is precedent to 37, decay of 42 probably accounted for slumping of 37. Burial probably let down from about the same level as 37. Depth of pit measured from level.
